mapper.select: SELECT -- 취업자 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(YEAR(취창업일) = YEAR(#{dashBoardYear}), 1, 0)), 0) AS dashBoardEmployedCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND YEAR(취창업일) = YEAR(#{dashBoardYear}), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardEmployedCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND YEAR(취창업일) = YEAR(#{dashBoardYear}), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardEmployedCountUser, -- 알선 취업자 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(취업유형 != '' AND 취업유형 IN ('알선', '소개취업'), 1, 0)), 0) AS dashBoardReferredEmployedCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND 취업유형 != '' AND 취업유형 IN ('알선', '소개취업'), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardReferredEmployedCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND 취업유형 != '' AND 취업유형 IN ('알선', '소개취업'), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardReferredEmployedCountUser, -- 조기 취업자 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(DATEDIFF(mm, 초기상담일, 취창업일) IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardEarlyEmployedCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND DATEDIFF(mm, 초기상담일, 취창업일) IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardEarlyEmployedCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND DATEDIFF(mm, 초기상담일, 취창업일) IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardEarlyEmployedCountUser, -- 나은일자리 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF((임금 >= 229) AND 진행단계 = '고보일반', 1, 0)), 0) AS dashBoardBetterJobCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND (임금 >= 229) AND 진행단계 = '고보일반', 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardBetterJobCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND (임금 >= 229) AND 진행단계 = '고보일반', 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardBetterJobCountUser, -- 고용유지 6개월 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 6 AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) <= 11, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardSixMonthRetentionCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND 진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 6 AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) <= 11, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardSixMonthRetentionCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND 진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 6 AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) <= 11, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardSixMonthRetentionCountUser, -- 고용유지 12개월 수 Query 조건 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 12, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardTwelveMonthRetentionCountTotal, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch} AND 진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 12, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardTwelveMonthRetentionCountBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND 진행단계 = '고보일반' AND DATEDIFF(mm, 취창업일, (IIF(퇴사일 = '', GETDATE(), 퇴사일))) >= 12, 1, 0)),0) AS dashBoardTwelveMonthRetentionCountUser FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE YEAR(등록일) = YEAR(#{dashBoardYear}) AND 취창업일 != '';

SELECT -- 전체 성공금 인센티브 ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(BIGINT, 성공금)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyTotal, ISNULL(SUM(CONVERT(BIGINT, 인센티브)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyTotalIncentive, -- 지점 성공금 인센티브 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch}, CONVERT(BIGINT, 성공금), 0)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyBranch, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(지점 = #{dashboardBranch}, CONVERT(BIGINT, 인센티브), 0)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyBranchIncentive, -- 개인 성공금 인센티브 ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID}, CONVERT(BIGINT, 성공금), 0)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyUser, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID}, CONVERT(BIGINT, 인센티브), 0)),0) AS dashBoardSuccessMoneyUserIncentive FROM SUCCESSMONEY WHERE YEAR(등록일) = #{dashBoardYear};
SELECT (SELECT SUM(지점인원) FROM J_참여자관리_지점) AS dashboardCountBranch, 지점인원 AS dashboardCountUser FROM J_참여자관리_지점 WHERE 지점 = #{dashboardBranch};
SELECT COUNT(구직번호) dashboardTotalCount FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND YEAR(등록일) = #{dashBoardYear}
SELECT COUNT(구직번호) dashboardCloseCount FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND YEAR(등록일) = #{dashBoardYear} AND 마감 = 'true'

SELECT COUNT(등록일) dashBoardParticipatedCountOne, (SELECT COUNT(구직번호) FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID}) dashBoardParticipatedCountTotal, YEAR(등록일) dashBoardParticipatedYear FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정=#{dashboardUserID} AND YEAR(등록일) <= #{dashBoardYear} GROUP BY YEAR(등록일) ORDER BY YEAR(등록일) DESC

SELECT COUNT(등록일) dashBoardParticipatedCountOne, (SELECT COUNT(구직번호) FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND 마감 = 'false' AND 진행단계 IN ('1', '2', '3', '미취업사후관리', 'IAP 전', 'IAP 후')) dashBoardParticipatedCountTotal, YEAR(등록일) dashBoardParticipatedYear FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정=#{dashboardUserID} AND 마감 = 'false' AND 진행단계 IN ('1','2','3','미취업사후관리','IAP 전','IAP 후') AND YEAR(등록일) <= #{dashBoardYear} GROUP BY YEAR(등록일) ORDER BY YEAR(등록일) DESC

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(IIF(진행단계 = '1' OR 진행단계 = 'IAP 전', 1, 0)), 0) AS dashBoardParticipatedCountOne, ISNULL(SUM(IIF(진행단계 = '2' OR 진행단계 = 'IAP 후', 1, 0)), 0) AS dashBoardParticipatedCountTwo, COUNT(구직번호) AS dashBoardParticipatedCountTotal, YEAR(등록일) AS dashBoardParticipatedYear FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND 마감 = 'false' AND 진행단계 IN ('1','2','3','미취업사후관리','IAP 전','IAP 후') AND YEAR(등록일) = #{dashBoardYear} GROUP BY YEAR(등록일) ORDER BY YEAR(등록일) DESC

--15일 기준 최근상담일, 구직만료일, 기간만료일 전체 데이터 SELECT -- 최근 상담일 15일 도래자 SUM(IIF(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),최근상담일) <= 15,1,0)) AS dashBoardLastCons, -- 구직가 만료일 15일 도래자 SUM(IIF(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),구직만료일) <= 15 AND 구직만료일 <> '',1,0)) AS dashBoardJobEX, -- 기간 만료일 15일 도래자 SUM(IIF(DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),기간만료일) <= 15 AND DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(),기간만료일) >= 0 AND 기간만료일 <> '',1,0)) AS dashBoardEXPDate FROM J_참여자관리 WHERE 전담자_계정 = #{dashboardUserID} AND (마감 = 'false' AND 최근상담일 <> '')
